      • send

        public <B extends BackendObject> rx.Observable<java.lang.Void> send(java.util.Collection<B> objects)
        Function used to save objects on remote server.
        Type Parameters:
        B - Object type that extends BackendObject.
        Parameters:
        objects - Collection of objects to be saved.
        Returns:
        Observable, no entity returned.

      • get

        public <B extends BackendObject> rx.Observable<java.util.Collection<B>> get(java.lang.Class<B> type,
                                                                   java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> objects)
        Function used to return specific objects corrosponding to the object keys provided.
        Type Parameters:
        B - Class type to be returned, extends BackendObject.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of objects to be returned, if an object of a key provided does not match Type, it will not be returned.
        objects - Collection of keys you wish to return from remote server.
        Returns:
        Collection of objects corrosponding to keys provided.

      • query

        public <B extends BackendObject> rx.Observable<java.util.Collection<B>> query(java.lang.Class<B> type,
                                                                     Query query)
        Function used to perform a remote query.
        Type Parameters:
        B - Type of object extending BackendObject to be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - Type of objects to be returned, Type must match that which was provided to the Query.
        query - Query to be executed.
        Returns:
        Collection of objects matching query executed.

      • count

        public <B extends BackendObject> rx.Observable<java.lang.Integer> count(java.lang.Class<B> type)
        Functin used to perform a count query against remote sever for specifed type.
        Type Parameters:
        B - Type extending BackendObject
        Parameters:
        type - Type to be counted.
        Returns:
        Count of objects on remote server matching specified type.
